definitions.definition: A type of soil ; an earthy mixture of sand , silt and clay , with organic matter to which its fertility is chiefly due.
A mixture of sand, clay, and other materials, used in making moulds for large castings , often without a pattern .

main_definition: ( geology ) A type of soil ; an earthy mixture of sand , silt and clay , with organic matter to which its fertility is chiefly due.
secondary_definitions: ( metalworking ) A mixture of sand, clay, and other materials, used in making moulds for large castings , often without a pattern .
